body.name: LED Desk Lamp,Adjustable Swing Arm Desk Lamp with Clamp,Dimmable Desk Light Eye-Care Table Light, Memory Function, 3 Color Modes, 10-Level Brightness Table Lamp for Home, Office, Study, Reading
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 21 hrs 35 mins
features: 【3 LIGHTING MODES & 10 BRIGHTNESS LEVELS】 Our LED desk lamp has 3 color temperatures optional: Warm light (3000K), Warm white light (4500K) and White light (6000K). Each lighting mode has 10 brightness dimming levels from 10% to 100%.

【ADJUSTABLE METAL CLAMP & LONG SWING ARM】 The strong metal clamp supports a desktop up to a 2 inch table and holds the swing arm lamp securely in place. You can freely adjust the angle, position, light direction according to your personal need.

【EYE PROTECTION】 Our LED desk lamp has uniform brightness, no glare, no ghosts, soft light, it is comfortable for your eyes. Brightness can be adjusted according to your own needs. Use high-quality LED lamp beads, better protect your eyes, let you focus on work.

【USB POWERED & MEMORY FUCTION】 Our LED desk light can be easily to plug the USB cable into any available USB port (laptop/ desktop/ power bank/ USB adapter) to power the lamp. The lamp will remember your brightness setting when turn off the light, not cut off the power supply.

【Please Note】 Please use 5V/2A adapter for the desk lamps. Otherwise, the desk light will not reach the highest brightness or flicker due to insufficient voltage and current, or cause the desk lamp to be damaged.【PACKAGING CONTENTS】1 x Desk Lamp, 1 x Metal Clamp,1 x User Manual, 1 x Adapter.
body.description: Adjustable Swing Arm LED Desk Lamp Product Description USB Output: 5V/2A Max Power Consumption: 14 W Color Temperature: 3000/4500/6000K Brightness Adjustment: 10 Levels Luminous Flux: 880 Lm Material: Metal / Aluminum Color Rendering Index: >80 Ra Please use 5V/2A adapter for the desk lamps. Otherwise, the desk light will not reach the highest brightness or flicker due to insufficient voltage and current.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Stepless Dimming & Adjustable Swing Arm Desk Lamp Beetwo LED Desk Lamp has 3 Color Modes (3000/4500/6000K, from warm to white) & 10 brightness Levels ( 10%-100%). It's very convenience and don't take much space. You can easy install the lamp to any desk within 2 inches.This LED desk light can be used in home, office, school, workshop, dorm, studio and it's suit for students, architects, designer, artist, typist...

Beetwo Desk Lamp Reduce eye fatigue and save valuable power at night with the LED Desk Lamp. 3 distinct lighting modes meet all your needs. And the Desk Light does not take up space and is very convenient. Package Included: 1 x Desk Lamp, 1 x Metal Clamp, 1 x User Manual, 1 x Adapter Adjustable Swing Arm LED Desk Lamp Product Description USB Output: 5V/2A Max Power Consumption: 14 W Color Temperature: 3000/4500/6000K Brightness Adjustment: 10 Levels Luminous Flux: 880 Lm Material: Metal / Aluminum Color Rendering Index: >80 Ra Please use 5V/2A adapter for the desk lamps. Otherwise, the desk light will not reach the highest brightness or flicker due to insufficient voltage and current.

Beetwo latest desk lamp use highly efficient LED, provide 14W enough brightness. The desk light has uniform brightness, large coverage, high brightness but soft. No glare, no flicker, protect your eyes from hurt, reduce eyes strain after reading and working for hours. The desk lamp metal wide clamp design provides a completely free surface, doesn't take up any space on the table. The desk light arm is 360° adjustable, you can freely adjust any angle, position. The table light can be perfectly used with the working desk, computer desk, drafting table, nail table or sewing table. The table lamp consumes 80% less power than traditional incandescent lights. Low energy consumption, less luminous heat, service life up to 50,000 hours. An ideal choice for students, teenagers, children, designers, artists, architects, manicurist, offices, and home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this light for my nail room and it definitely is bright. Great for adjusting, wish it did have more move options but works great and easy to aset up or attach to most desks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered 2 of these and they are great!!! I use mine for lighting at my hobby table! It's great! Love how easy this is and the different lighting...soft warm to bright is just awesome! the other one is used by my wife as well for her art work table while she paints!Easy to use, convenient and super versatile on where we can put these! The USB option is great for today's power strips that have USB plug-ins vs stardard plug...which is super nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for price
reviews.reviewText: I like this lamp alot, it feels sturdy and its pretty bright. The range of motion isnt too bad either.The parts could probably move a bit more smoothly, and the power cable could be alot longer, but its getting the job done great for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much for so little
reviews.reviewText: I just love the versatility of this desk lamp. I guess I didn't read all the features when I first ordered it but when I discovered the three different types of lighting it provides I got really excited. I also like the ease at which it can be moved from one location to another and the variety of positions available with the maneuverable arm. To me it's ultra-modern and looks really great in the den of my new house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this lamp
reviews.reviewText: Bright light. Easy to set up and use. Extremely adjustable. Doesn't put out heat like many desk lights do. All around great light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Expected more life
reviews.reviewText: This product was very good and met all expectations. The reason for the low overall score was that this lasted less than year. It started having problems at month 10, the light would not always come on. I had to press the button multiple times before it would finally stay on. Now it does not work at all. Very disappointed it did not last very long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice light for my studio room.
reviews.reviewText: Although I think I would appreciate a bit of a longer cord, this light turned out to be very useful. I live it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great for remote work, but doesn't last long
reviews.reviewText: I love this light, so much that I have gone through 3-4 of them in the last two years. I work remotely and it is a great desk light and wonderful for Zoom calls when the background gets a little too dark. My only knock on this thing is that it dies so quickly. I just purchased this in Aug 2023, and am now looking for another in December. I've had to return multiple lights because they die within days. the plug can be very finicky and you have to have it in the perfect spot to turn it on. I am now looking into other more expensive options because this just isn't cutting it anymore.
